title: All exits shall provide continuous means of egress to the exterior of a building or to an exterior o
clause_text: All exits shall provide continuous means of egress to the exterior of a building or to an exterior open space leading to a street and, Exits shall be so arranged that they may be reached without passing through another occupied unit.
section: The following General requirements shall apply to exits
